posts.title: p(Doom)1 Website Release - Deployment Infrastructure Complete
posts.excerpt: Successfully implemented and documented the complete deployment pipeline for the p(Doom)1 website with GitHub Actions, DreamHost integration, and automated status updates.

posts.title: PyInstaller Implementation and Type Annotation Completion
posts.excerpt: Major milestone reached with PyInstaller integration complete and comprehensive type annotation coverage across the entire codebase.

posts.title: Enhanced Leaderboard System - Version 0.4.1
posts.excerpt: New leaderboard features including persistent high scores, player statistics, and improved UI for competitive gameplay tracking.

posts.title: Version 0.3.0 Consolidated Release
posts.excerpt: Major feature consolidation with improved debug console, enhanced event system, and significant stability improvements.

posts.title: Debug Console System Implementation
posts.excerpt: New in-game debug console for developers and advanced users, enabling real-time game state inspection and command execution.

posts.title: Major Type Annotation Milestone Reached
posts.excerpt: Comprehensive type annotation sprint completed, dramatically improving code quality, IDE support, and development experience.

posts.title: Version 0.2.12 Release Notes
posts.excerpt: Bug fixes, performance improvements, and UI enhancements in this incremental release focused on stability and user experience.

posts.title: Welcome to the pdoom1 Dev Blog
posts.excerpt: Kicking off the development blog with goals, roadmap, and how to get involved in this satirical AI safety strategy game.
